responsibilities: Own large new areas within the product, delivering customer-ready features with engineering excellence.
Work across backend, frontend, and interact with LLMs and/or other ML models.
Work across the entire product lifecycle from conceptualization through production.
Multi-task and learn new technologies quickly.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new product features and experiences.
Respond to fast-turnaround product requests for high-value customers.
skills: Proficiency in one or more of Python, Node, React, Next.js, and MongoDB.
Solid background in algorithms, data structures, and object-oriented programming.
Strong written and verbal communication skills.
Ability to work both independently and as part of a team.
qualifications: 5+ years of full-time engineering experience, post-graduation.
Experience scaling products at hyper-growth startups.
Excitement to work with AI technologies.
Strong knowledge of software engineering best practices (nice to have).
Experience with AI platforms and technologies, including generative models and LLMs (nice to have).
Experience building ML infrastructure and AI-powered solutions (nice to have).
Experience growing new products from 0 to 1 (nice to have).
